documents.document: Not bad Given the size of European hotels the general level of customer service in Amsterdam this place was not bad. Customer service was adequate and the room was neat clean. Furnishings were new modern. The price was right for me: 120 USD or less per night. Great location: close to the Leidseplein Rijksmuseum and away from the tacky / seedy Red Light and Central Station areas. That said, everything in Amsterdam is walking distance. Did have a little bit of a mosquito problem, but that is to be expected any where with all those canals and no AC (necessitating open windows).
